name: laxquiz
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lax quiz
des:
This is an app to help test and improve our math and letter skills, it is intended to provide random questions related to math like addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. It also asks questions in english vocabulary like what comes before after a letter and what letter does a word start with.

Math is divided into two section, prek section which is asking questions for number( less than 6) and vocabulary, other set of users which will get little harder questions

To answer the questions use terms like:
* answer is <answer>
* its <answer>

since some questions require more time, recommend using word like "repeat", "sorry", so that Alexa is busy repeating question and you get more time to answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
